cs.CV, cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper discusses the use of computer vision, pattern recognition, and signal processing to automate the challenging task of lip reading, which suggests that it belongs to the computer vision (cs.CV) sub-category. Additionally, the paper mentions applications such as audio-visual speech recognition (AVSR), sign language recognition, and video surveillance, which are related to the sub-categories of speech and natural language processing (cs.CL), multimedia (cs.MM), and machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper also mentions statistical modelling, which is related to the sub-category of statistics and machine learning (cs.SD).
